ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( A e. CC -> -u A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cosadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ -u A e. CC ) -> ( cos ` ( A + -u A ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpdan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( A + -u A ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_negid | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A + -u A ) = 0 ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( A + -u A ) ) = ( cos ` 0 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cos0 | |- ( cos ` 0 ) = 1 |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( A + -u A ) ) = 1 ) |
| 8 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sqcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_sqcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_addcomd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10 | #P_sqvald | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_cosneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` -u A ) = ( cos ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` A ) ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) ) |
| 17 | 8 | #P_sqvald | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_sinneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` -u A ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_negeqd | |- ( A e. CC -> -u ( sin ` -u A ) = -u -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 20 | 8 | #P_negnegd | |- ( A e. CC -> -u -u ( sin ` A ) = ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> -u ( sin ` -u A ) = ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u ( sin ` -u A ) ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 23 | 17, 22 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) |
| 24 | 1 | #P_sincld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` -u A ) e. CC ) |
| 25 | 8, 24 | #P_mulneg2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u ( sin ` -u A ) ) = -u ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) |
| 26 | 23, 25 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) = -u ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) |
| 27 | 16, 26 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) + -u ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 1 | #P_coscld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` -u A ) e. CC ) |
| 29 | 10, 28 | #P_mulcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 30 | 8, 24 | #P_mulcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 31 | 29, 30 | #P_negsubd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) + -u ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) = ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) ) |
| 32 | 12, 27, 31 | #P_3eqtrrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( cos ` -u A ) ) - ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( sin ` -u A ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) ) |
| 33 | 3, 7, 32 | #P_3eqtr3rd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( cos ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) = 1 ) |
